amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the authorization of funding for the space station.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 16 in the Congressional Record of May 8, 1996, to eliminate the authorization in the bill for funding of the international space station.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 286 (Roll no. 205).
